headline: The Fed has bought over $90B in Treasury bills since December. Why this has a huge impact on your finances.
summary: The Treasury Deparment said Wednesday that the Federal Reserve has bought more than $90 billion of short-dated government bills over the past eight weeks.

headline: Qualcomm’s stock falls as memory constraints hit outlook
summary: Tech companies across the board are feeling the sting of memory-chip shortages, and Qualcomm just showed it’s no exception.

headline: This trucker is finally seeing signs of a bottom, and providing a boost to transport stocks
summary: Old Dominion’s stock surged into record territory after saying a long freight recession may finally be ending, and is helping provide a boost to the overall transportation sector.

headline: Software ate the world. Now, Wall Street is worried AI will eat software.
summary: Investors have quickly moved to sell shares of companies that looked like they could be on the menu

headline: Soybean prices surge to highest level this year, as Trump surprises market with plan for more sales to China
summary: The sort of buying President Trump outlined from China seems “unlikely on many fronts, but neither can the possibility be ignored,” analyst says.

headline: E.l.f. Beauty stock soars 15% on big earnings beat, raised guidance
summary: Shares of E.l.f. Beauty surged Wednesday after the company reported a major earnings beat.

headline: E.l.f. Beauty’s more upbeat outlook shows demand for cosmetics is still growing
summary: E.l.f. Beauty’s stock surged after a raised outlook for both sales and profit, as demand for cosmetics keeps growing.

headline: SpaceX rivals AST SpaceMobile and Rocket Lab join space-stock selloff
summary: Losses could be tied in part to this week’s software rout, according to one analyst.

headline: Powell probe will get resolved, clearing the way for Warsh’s confirmation, key Republican senator says
summary: Senate Banking Committee Chair Tim Scott indicated Wednesday that he expects the Department of Justice will resolve its criminal probe of current Federal Reserve chief Jerome Powell, clearing a path for the panel to advance President Donald Trump’s nominee for the top Fed job, Kevin Warsh.

headline: Terrell Owens calls Hall of Fame process 'broken' after Belichick, Kraft snubs
summary: Terrell Owens weighed in on the exclusion of Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft from the Pro Football Hall of Fame.

headline: Builders pitch ‘Trump home’ policies, stoking gains for their stocks
summary: Home builders are reportedly pitching affordable-home policies to the Trump administration, and their shares were rising Wednesday.

headline: Eli Lilly's GLP-1 growth is only getting started as Novo Nordisk braces for a decline in 2026
summary: The split in outlook underscores Lilly's strong position in the obesity market, underpinned by more effective drugs and its direct-to-consumer sales strategy.

headline: Hedge funds made $24 billion shorting software stocks so far in 2026 — And they are increasing the bet
summary: Hedge funds are increasing their short bets against software stocks, contributing to the brutal sell-off in the space so far this year, according to sources at two major funds on Wall Street.

headline: Nvidia’s stock gets swept up in software selloff, but this analyst says that makes no sense
summary: The “indiscriminate” chip selloff is reminiscent of DeepSeek fears that were “proved unfounded,” a Bank of America analyst said.

headline: Corporate DEI index sees 65% drop in participation from Fortune 500 companies
summary: Human Rights Campaign's Corporate Equity Index saw a 65% drop in participation of Fortune 500 companies willing to disclose their equity practices.

headline: These hot S&P 500 stocks show where investors are heading as they run away from tech
summary: The industrials sector has been a big beneficiary of the rotation out of tech, with a number of defense and transportation stocks hitting new highs on Wednesday.

headline: I’m 59, earning six figures, but my daughter wants me to retire to watch my future grandkid for a year. Can I afford it?
summary: “I do have a decent 401(k) and also should be able to benefit from my husband’s Social Security.”

headline: Here’s the new dates for January jobs and CPI inflation reports
summary: The U.S. employment report for January originally due on Friday has been rescheduled for the middle of next week — and the consumer price index was also pushed back a couple of days.

headline: We're booking profits in 2 Dow stocks riding double-digit gains to start 2026
summary: Our patience is finally paying off.

headline: The Social Security data breach is a national-security disaster that could hurt Americans for the rest of their lives: whistleblower
summary: Every American’s personal data is at risk of fraud after DOGE’s alleged mismanagement, Social Security’s former chief data officer tells MarketWatch.

headline: This company is providing relief from higher utility rates, and the stock is surging
summary: Enphase’s stock was soaring Wednesday after the company’s upbeat earnings report and a view that residential solar demand has bottomed as consumers look for relief from higher electricity costs.

headline: The economy got off to a decent start in the new year. Businesses hope things get even better.
summary: The largest part of the  economy expanded again in January and pointed to decent growth early in the new year, as businesses grapple with the lingering effects of highs tariffs and how to adopt artificial intelligence.

headline: Why AMD’s stock is diving toward its worst day in years after earnings
summary: AMD’s beat wasn’t as strong as it seemed, and high operating expenditures also clouded a strong report.

headline: Car sales sputtered in icy January. Poor weather wasn’t the only problem for auto dealers and the U.S. economy.
summary: Sales of new cars and trucks — a barometer for the economy — sank in January to the lowest level in three years after a major winter storm. Yet it could be a tough year for automakers even after the weather gets warmer.

headline: Glencore’s strategic allure highlighted by sale of mining assets to U.S. government-backed entity
summary: The upshot of Glencore selling a stake in its DRC business to a U.S. government backed entity is a cash injection and a potential derisking of its mining operations.

headline: ‘I’m too cute to be waiting’: A guy I’m dating is constantly late. Is this a financial red flag?
summary: “He is always apologetic.”

headline: The most important Amazon earnings figure comes with a high bar this time
summary: To impress investors, Amazon will need to show continued momentum in its cloud-computing business. But the real number to beat may be higher than the consensus view of 21% growth.

headline: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Wednesday
summary: The S&P 500 edged higher ahead of the opening bell following a losing session on Wall Street.

headline: Another missile maker partners with the Trump administration, and the stock rises to record heights
summary: RTX’s Raytheon unit announced five agreements with the Pentagon to boost capacity and deliveries of Tomahawk and interceptor missiles.

headline: ADP jobs report shows paltry 22,000 increase in private hiring. Sluggish labor market not getting any better.
summary: Job creation has plummeted since trade wars and immigration crackdown
